pr_title: Avoiding queries that check whether a BQ table is empty for streaming inserts

timeline.message: Avoiding queries that check whether a BQ table is empty for streaming inserts.

timeline.bodyText: I think you can limit calling _is_table_empty for only when the disposition is WRITE_EMPTY.
timeline.author: udim
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -924,7 +924,8 @@ def get_or_create_table(
 
     # If table exists already then handle the semantics for WRITE_EMPTY and
     # WRITE_TRUNCATE write dispositions.
-    if found_table:
+    if found_table and write_disposition in (
+        BigQueryDisposition.WRITE_EMPTY, BigQueryDisposition.WRITE_TRUNCATE):
       table_empty = self._is_table_empty(project_id, dataset_id, table_id)

replies.bodyText: good catch. LMK if it looks better now.
replies.author: pabloem
